name: (Prototype) Meiling Bashing Simulator
description:
Made for Touhou Fan Game Jam #6, theme: Combo

How this game fulfills the theme: Clownpiece + Utsuho combo; also because of the combo attack that can be performed

I wanted this to become a fighting game of sort at first... but then I realized I overscoped and that with only 3 days such a thing is just impossible. Moreover I effectively only had 1 day for this jam since my schedule was unfortunately very cluttered this weekend. Very bad timing.

As a result... what came out was only... a bashing simulator rather than a fighting game. There are so many stuffs I wanted to add -- in particular I imagine a final skill in my mind where the fusion of Clownpiece and Utsuho's attack is in full display: shooting both MOON and SUN!!! But of course, I couldn't add it in the end due to time constraint m(_ _;)m

Anyway, enjoy the bashing simulator. It's very half-baked submission I admit; but I hope some Touhou fan can somewhat smile at this... or sth... ;_;

P.S.: Yeah. I love Clownpiece (and Utsuho) and I hate Meiling. Got a problem with that? (^_^;
